act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Bug 中的方法
Moves if it can move, turns otherwise.
act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Critter 中的方法
A critter acts by getting a list of other actors, processing that list, getting locations to move to, selecting one of them, and moving to the selected location.
act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Flower 中的方法
Causes the color of this flower to darken.

act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Rock 中的方法
Overrides the act method in the Actor class to do nothing.

World<T> - info.gridworld.world 中的 类
A World is the mediator between a grid and the GridWorld GUI.
World() - 类 info.gridworld.world.World 的构造方法
 
World(Grid<T>) - 类 info.gridworld.world.World 的构造方法
 
WorldFrame<T> - info.gridworld.gui 中的 类
The WorldFrame displays a World and allows manipulation of its occupants.
WorldFrame(World<T>) - 类 info.gridworld.gui.WorldFrame 的构造方法
Constructs a WorldFrame that displays the occupants of a world
WorldFrame.GUIExceptionHandler - info.gridworld.gui 中的 类
Nested class that is registered as the handler for exceptions on the Swing event thread.
WorldFrame.GUIExceptionHandler() - 类 info.gridworld.gui.WorldFrame.GUIExceptionHandler 的构造方法
 

Z

zoomIn() - 类 info.gridworld.gui.GridPanel 中的方法
Zooms in the display by doubling the current cell size.
zoomOut() - 类 info.gridworld.gui.GridPanel 中的方法
Zooms out the display by halving the current cell size.
